title: Rajputana Polki Kundan and Ruby Haaram
materials: Freshwater Pearls. Hyderabadi Polish for a lustrous
features: Elaborately crafted Polki Kundan setting with floral and paisley motifs. The intricate layered design features a graduating pattern with larger teardrop Ruby pendants suspended below. Delicate strings of Freshwater Pearls add movement and elegance. Exquisite workmanship showcases the finest traditions of Hyderabadi jewelry making.
colors: Creamy White (Freshwater Pearls). A classic and regal color palette synonymous with South Indian bridal jewelry.
description: A timeless masterpiece showcasing traditional craftsmanship and opulence. The combination of Polki diamonds, vibrant rubies, and lustrous pearls creates a stunning and unforgettable statement. This Haaram is designed to be cherished for generations, representing a valuable heirloom.
